name: Froggo! (Party Boi)
description:
Our brave warrior, Froggo, is in need of pineapples! He must avoid deadly spikes and spinning saws to reach his precious fruit! You must guide him through all 3 deadly levels by reaching the flag at the end! Have fun!

-partyboi113

This project was made after following Coding In flow's 2D Platformer Tutorial! Credits to him for a great tutorial series!

Instructions

Use your arrow keys to navigate the world! Avoid the spikes and saws! Try to collect all the pineapples and reach the flag to end the level!
